id.description: locally unique identifier of the graph format

direction.description: Whether all edges are in a graph are directed, undirected, either/or, or can be mixed

multiEdges.description: The same edge can appear multiple times in a graph

visualAttributes.description: Nodes and edges can have special attributes for visual layout

loops.description: Edges can connect a node to itself

nodeTypes.description: Type or category of a node. Known as 'label' in labeled property graphs

edgeTypes.description: Type or category of an edge. Known as 'label' in labeled property graphs

nodeName.description: Special field to name an individual node

edgeName.description: Special field to name an individual edge

hierarchy.description: Are subgraphs expressible and if so, can a node have multiple parents?

hyperEdges.description: Allow edges that connect more than one node
